original_text: For even those who are circumcised do not themselves keep the law, but they desire to have you circumcised that they may boast in your flesh.
korean_text: 할례를 받은 그들이라도 스스로 율법은 지키지 아니하고 너희에게 할례를 받게 하려 하는 것은 그들이 너희의 육체로 자랑하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: For even those who are circumcised
do not themselves keep the law
but they desire to have you circumcised
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 너희에게 할례를 받게 하기를 원합니다

sentences.original_text: that they may boast in your flesh
